rules_text:
If Nopon Caravan wasn't cast from your hand, it enters the battlefield transformed.
When Nopon Caravan enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 green Nopon creature tokens.
Sacrifice Nopon Caravan: Nopon you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
rules_text2:
Whenever Nopon Chef attacks, Nopon you control get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
When Nopon Chef dies, create a 1/1 green Nopon creature token.
flavor_text2: [i]Cheffypon's food is so good, there's always a stampede to get some.[/i]
